alert.note: Alert for Northern Westchester; Putnam; Rockland (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 12:47PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF ROCKLAND, NORTHERN WESTCHESTER, AND WESTERN PUTNAM COUNTIES THROUGH 130 PM... At 1246 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm Nyack, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ossining and Haverstraw around 1255 PM EDT. Peekskill around 115 PM EDT. Yorktown Heights around 120 PM EDT. Mahopac around 130 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include West Nyack, Valley Cottage, Grand View-On-Hudson, Putnam Valley, Congers, Blauvelt, Irvington, Croton-on-Hudson, Jefferson Valley and Bardonia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
